interestingFact: India is home to the world’s largest democracy.
The Statue of Liberty was a gift from France to the USA.
The Eiffel Tower was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest on Earth.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area.
Egypt is home to the ancient pyramids and the Great Sphinx of Giza.
Japan has more than 100 active volcanoes.
Germany is known for its automotive industry and Oktoberfest.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system.
Italy is known for its historical landmarks like the Colosseum and Leaning Tower of Pisa.
The UK is home to Big Ben and the world's oldest royal residence, Windsor Castle.
